actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.
Reported to House from the Committee on House Administration, H. Rept. 95-58.
Measure called up as privileged matter in House.

official_title: Resolution providing additional funds for the expenses of the Committee on House Administration to carry out its responsibilities under 2 U.S.C. et seq., and the Rules of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on House Administration to incur such further expenses as it deems advisable to carry out its responsibilities with respect to settling the seven contested elections pending before it. Directs that such expenses be paid out of the contingent fund of the House.

titles.title: Resolution providing additional funds for the expenses of the Committee on House Administration to carry out its responsibilities under 2 U.S.C. et seq., and the Rules of the House of Representatives.
